# Eng. Luciano Mori

> Software Engineer specializing in Cloud, AI & Cybersecurity, based in Ottawa, Canada. Enabling software-based solutions through cloud and data-driven technologies.

## About

Luciano Mori is a Software Engineer with expertise across Cloud Infrastructure, Artificial Intelligence, and Cybersecurity/DevSecOps. He designs and deploys secure, scalable cloud workloads across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud, and builds intelligent AI applications from prototype to production with a focus on responsible AI practices. He has represented Snyk at Black Hat 2025, sharing approaches to securing AI-generated code from inception to production.

## Core Capabilities

- **Cloud & Training**: Designing and deploying secure, scalable cloud workloads across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. Delivering cloud training sessions and workshops.
- **AI Solutions**: Designing and deploying intelligent, secure AI applications. Bringing AI responsibly into cloud solutions from prototypes to production.
- **DevSecOps**: Securing AI-generated code from inception to production. Represented Snyk at Black Hat 2025.

## Certifications

- AWS Solutions Architect – Associate
- AWS Developer – Associate
- Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
- GitHub Actions
- Google Cloud Digital Leader
- Google Cloud Generative AI Leader
- IBM Application Developer
